Texts.Chs: 阿威坎历史 —— 第六部分
在1 BF时，特尔提勒人带来了强大的力量，以致我们难以认清现实。 特尔提勒战船挡住了阳光，卡达万的天空变黑了。 我们终于知道，前八次入侵对特尔提勒的打击只能算是小规模的偷袭-他们几乎不关心迄今为止的微薄损失。
Texts.Eng: In 1 BF, the Theleans came at us with a force so large we could hardly believe it was real. The skies of Kadavan went black as Thelean ships blocked out the sun. We then learned that the previous eight invasions had been nothing more than small raids to the Theleans - they hardly even cared about their meagre losses thus far.

Texts.Chs: ...留下来的人主要是志愿者，他们希望确保特尔提勒人不会得到他们想要的东西。 在逃跑之前，我们在船上装载了许多古者的遗物和工艺品，并封绝了古者的穹隆之所，以使特尔提勒永远无法得到它们。
Texts.Eng: The ones we left behind were largely volunteers who wanted to ensure that the Theleans would not get what they wanted. We loaded as many of the Old Ones' relics and artefacts on board our ships before we fled, and sealed the vaults of the Old Ones so the Theleans could never get to them.

Texts.Chs: 我们知道这是一场我们永远无法取胜的战争，因此长老们决定完全逃离卡达文。 我们所有的飞船都被召回，并组装了庞大的舰队-诺玛达（Nomada）。 我们将尽可能多的阿威坎收容在船上，并使用我们从古者飞具上学到的跃迁门技术逃离了这个星系。
Texts.Eng: We knew that this was a war we could never win, and thus the Elders decided to flee Kadavan altogether. All of our spaceships were called back and an enormous fleet of ships was assembled - the Nomada. We fit as many Avikan on board as we could, and fled the system using the jumpgates we learned to build from the Old Ones.
